name: Volcanic Environment
description: Intense heat, lava flows, and sulfurous gases

1-3.name: Mild Heat
1-3.description: Warm volcanic activity with minor effects

effects.message: The warm air carries volcanic heat and sulfur scents.

4-6.name: Moderate Heat
4-6.description: Active volcanic vents and heated ground

effects.message: Volcanic heat and gases create uncomfortable conditions.

7-9.name: Intense Heat
7-9.description: Dangerous lava flows and extreme temperatures

effects.message: The intense heat from flowing lava is overwhelming!

10-12.name: Extreme Heat
10-12.description: Near the volcano's core with deadly conditions

effects.message: You're dangerously close to the volcano's molten core!

effects.description: The intense heat sears exposed flesh

fire.description: Fire types thrive in volcanic heat, regenerating instead of taking damage

water.description: Water types suffer greatly in volcanic environments

earth.description: Earth types have some resistance to volcanic environments

ice.description: Ice types are extremely vulnerable to volcanic heat
